entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one turning pages and reading aloud from 'Muggleborn Register'. She has a distaste expression similar to when she handled 'Secrets of the Darkest Art'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as saying 'People won't let this happen' in response to Hermione's reading.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as saying 'It is happening, Ron' and stating that Muggleborns are being rounded up.

entities.name: muggleborn register
entities.description: The 'Muggleborn Register' is a document mentioned as the source of information about Muggleborns and their magical power.

entities.name: secrets of the darkest art
entities.description: Hermione mentions handling 'Secrets of the Darkest Art' with a similar distaste expression as when she was reading from the 'Muggleborn Register'.

entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: The Department of Mysteries is mentioned as undertaking research that reveals magic can only be passed from person to person when Wizards reproduce.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as undertaking a survey of Muggleborns and issuing an invitation for them to present themselves for interview by the Muggleborn Registration Commission.

entities.name: muggleborn registration commission
entities.description: The Muggleborn Registration Commission is mentioned as being newly appointed and responsible for interviewing Muggleborns.

relationships.description: Hermione reads aloud from the 'Muggleborn Register'.
Ron responds to Lupin's statement that Muggleborns are being rounded up.
Lupin states that Muggleborns are being rounded up as we speak.
